description: Try our easy to follow Asian Salad with Avocado & Salmon recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Salad,Pescatarian,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Valentine's Day,Sesame free,Summer,Soy free,Wheat free,Avocado,Dairy free,Peanut free,Salmon
name: Asian Salad with Avocado & Salmon Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Halve the cucumber and slice. Coarsely grate carrot and combine in a bowl with cucumber, cabbage, spring onion, coriander and mint. Halve the avocado, remove the stone and slice. Add to the salad with flaked salmon.
Whisk lime rind and juice, fish sauce, brown sugar and chilli together until sugar has disolved. Pour over salad and toss to combine. Serve.
